channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.0.0-beta.4)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.0.0-beta.4)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.0.0-beta.4 - 2023-06-19 # If you’re using v0.3.x or older, Please upgrade to v0.4.x before upgrading v1.x.x! もし v0.3.x 以前を使用しているのであれば, v1.x.xに更新する前に v0.4.x に更新してください! Changed # Merged changes in 0.4.8, 0.4.9, 0.4.10, and 0.4.11 0.4.11 - 2023-06-19 # Changed # Show error with user friendly message if blendshape for eyelids are removed / frozen.
